Uses of Class
com.mhealthatlas.enterpriseapps.dto.portfolio.PortfolioCommandDto

Packages that use PortfolioCommandDto 
Package Description
com.mhealthatlas.enterpriseapps.command
com.mhealthatlas.enterpriseapps.command is a group of services which only mutate data but have not advanced query functionalities.
com.mhealthatlas.enterpriseapps.controller
com.mhealthatlas.enterpriseapps.controller is a group of REST API controllers in the enterprise service.
Each class ending with the QueryController prefix provides GET API endpoints for quering information.
Each class ending with the CommandController prefix provides POST and DELETE API endpoints for mutating the information state.
